title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: In 2021, the GWC continues to focus efforts on enhancing and strengthening effective and accountable humanitarian coordination for timely, predictable, and high-quality WASH responses.;;The GWC has demonstrated innovation in the way that it has;transitioned from a coordination platform, focused;on operational support, to driving sector strategy and policy,;able to influence decision-makers, as a ‘thought-leader’ for the WASH sector. ;Through the provision of direct support to national coordination platforms in 31 countries, the GWC strived to achieve impact through the targeting of 79 million people most affected by crisis in the WASH sector in 2021. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/03/2022
